h_t  as a function of foot_syls in L*H
```{r fig.height=4, fig.width=12}
temp_mdl = lmer(h_t ~ foot_syls +(1 + foot_syls | speaker),
              data = pn_foot %>%
    filter(acc_phon == "L*H") %>%  select(-acc_phon),
              control = lmerControl(
                                    optimizer = "optimx",
                                    calc.derivs = FALSE,
                                    optCtrl = list(
                                                   method = "nlminb",
                                                   starttests = FALSE,
                                                   kkt = FALSE
                                                   )
                                    )
              )




#step(temp_mdl)
drawResiduals(temp_mdl)
tidy(anova(temp_mdl)) %>%
  mutate(p.value = round(p.value, 6),
         statistic = round(statistic, 3)) %>% 
  rename("F value" = statistic)
summary(temp_mdl)
anova(temp_mdl)
cat(c(
  "\nperformance::check_singularity(temp_mdl): ",
  check_singularity(temp_mdl, tolerance = 1e-05),
  "\n"
))
  

```

```{r echo=FALSE, fig.height=4, fig.width=6, message=TRUE, warning=TRUE}
plot_model(temp_mdl,
  title = "h_t ~ foot_syls + gender + (1 + foot_syls | speaker)",
  #show.intercept = TRUE,
  show.values = TRUE,
  vline.color = "red",
  colors = "Black"
)

summary(temp_mdl)
anova(temp_mdl)
r.squaredGLMM(temp_mdl)
```

h_t re acc_phon
I am interpreting the mean estimates output in the foot_syl lh_slopes by this model as essentially representing the timing of H targets once acc_phon, gender, and speaker have been taken into accout
```{r fig.height=4, fig.width=12}
temp_mdl = lmer(h_t ~ foot_syls + acc_phon + gender + (1 + foot_syls | speaker),
              data = pn_foot %>% 
                     filter(acc_phon %in% c("H*", ">H*", "L*H")) %>% 
                     mutate(acc_phon = factor(acc_phon,
                                              levels = c("H*", ">H*", "L*H"))
                                              ),
              control = lmerControl(
                                    optimizer = "optimx",
                                    calc.derivs = FALSE,
                                    optCtrl = list(
                                                   method = "nlminb",
                                                   starttests = FALSE,
                                                   kkt = FALSE
                                                   )
                                    )
              )




#step(temp_mdl)
drawResiduals(temp_mdl)
tidy(anova(temp_mdl)) %>%
  mutate(p.value = round(p.value, 6),
         statistic = round(statistic, 3)) %>% 
  rename("F value" = statistic)
summary(temp_mdl)
anova(temp_mdl)
  

```


```{r echo=FALSE, fig.height=4, fig.width=6, message=TRUE, warning=TRUE}
plot_model(temp_mdl,
  title = "h_t ~ foot_syls + acc_phon + gender + (1 + foot_syls | speaker)",
  #show.intercept = TRUE,
  show.values = TRUE,
  vline.color = "red",
  colors = "Black"
)

summary(temp_mdl)
anova(temp_mdl)
r.squaredGLMM(temp_mdl)
```
